overview: When a spirited peasant girl is promised to a stranger, she uses every last ounce of cunning and charm to thwart her parentsâ€™ plans and get the man she actually loves.  From the vibrant overture to the riotous polka, Smetana places dance at the heart of his sparkling work. This festive celebration of Czech culture and identity is re-imagined into the heart of the English countryside with this new production at Garsington Opera.
title: The Bartered Bride
